message: It is great and the students are learning well. I really appreciate that students are focused and show commitment to learn.
It is very helpful. The feedback from each lesson is very helpful for me to keep updated on the progress she learned. The tutor is very passionate about what she teaches.
position: Parent of a student at Peak Education

message: For one of my students, she (the student) used to really struggle at reading, I could hear his unwillingness at reading. But now she can read the whole paragraph without making big mistakes and I'm sure she's starting to enjoy it.
